#include <iostream>
    #include <string>
    #include <algorithm> 
    #include <vector>
    using namespace std;
    int main(){
        string word; 
        cin>>word; 
        sort(word.begin(), word.end()); 
        vector<string> str; 
        do str.push_back(word);
        while( next_permutation(word.begin(),word.end()) ); 
        string line;
        for (int i = 0; i < str.size(); ++i)cout<<str[i]<<endl;
              
     
        
        
        return 0;
    }
